sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Children and Family Community Protection Act.

sections.heading: Public hearing.
sections.text:
The board of education shall conduct a public
hearing at which interested persons may ask questions of the board
concerning the proposed construction or conversion and may offer comments
(written, verbal, or both) on the proposal.

sections.heading: Enforcement.
sections.text:
Any property owner to whom notice is required to be
sent under this Act may seek enforcement of the provisions of this Act by
commencing a civil action in the circuit court.
